name: nodelamp
description: A Node Apache Linux MySql PHP Server.

scripts.dk:build: docker build --tag=nodelamp .                          #This creates a Docker image, which weâ€™re going to name using the --tag option
scripts.list-container: npm run dk:lsc                                   # alias of dk:lsc
scripts.dk:fg: docker run -p 4000:80 nodelamp                            #@a Run in foreground the container
scripts.dk:bg: docker run -d -p 4000:80 nodelamp                         #@a Run in background the container
scripts.dk:publish:tag: docker tag nodelamp jgwill/nodelamp               #@a Tag image
scripts.dk:publish:push: docker push jgwill/nodelamp:latest               #@a Push image in docker repo
scripts.c: cat package.json | grep dk                                    # List these commands
scripts.dk:bash:nodelamp: docker run -i -t --rm jgwill/nodelamp /bin/bash #@a Run NodeLamp with a bash
scripts.dk:bash:ubuntu: docker run -i -t --rm ubuntu /bin/bash            #@a Run an ubuntu and start a bash
scripts.jgwill:nodelamp:compose:run:bash: docker-compose run nodelampwebserver bash    #@a Runs a Bash after composing the image

author: Guillaume Isabelle
